title: Mushroom Spear
summaries: The Mushroom Spear is a Hardmode spear that summons seven spinning mushroom projectiles that linger in midair when used, dealing 33% of the spear's base damage (45 damage) but do not inflict knockback. The Mushroom Spear can be purchased from the Truffle for 70 GC after at least one of the mechanical bosses has been defeated.
Its best modifier is Godly or Demonic. Both modifiers increase the average damage output by the same amount.
